SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
game.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class View extends Object implements Observer
The View class is responsible for managing and updating the graphical components of the game. It implements the Observer pattern to observe the Model and update the view accordingly.

  • Constructor Details

    • View

      private View(GameFrame gameFrame, LevelPanel levelPanel, TransitionPanel transitionPanel)
      Private constructor for initializing the View with the provided GameFrame, LevelPanel and TransitionPanel.
      Parameters:
      gameFrame - the GameFrame instance that represents the main game window.
      levelPanel - the LevelPanel used for rendering the game level.
      transitionPanel - the TransitionPanel used for displaying transitions between levels.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static View getInstance(GameFrame gameFrame)
      Gets the singleton instance of View. If the instance does not exist, it creates a new one with the specified GameFrame.
      Parameters:
      gameFrame - the GameFrame instance that represents the main game window.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of View.

    • getInstance

      public static View getInstance()
      Gets the current singleton instance of View. This method does not create a new instance if one does not exist.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of View.

    • getGameFrame

      public GameFrame getGameFrame()
      Gets the GameFrame instance.
      Returns:
      the GameFrame used by the game.

    • getMenuPanel

      public MenuPanel getMenuPanel()
      Gets the MenuPanel from the game frame.
      Returns:
      the MenuPanel instance.

    • getTransitionPanel

      public TransitionPanel getTransitionPanel()

      public CheatFrame getCheatFrame()

    • setCheatFrame

      public void setCheatFrame(CheatFrame cheatFrame)
      Sets the CheatFrame instance for cheat controls.
      Parameters:
      cheatFrame - the CheatFrame instance to be set.

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      Updates the view based on notifications from the observed Model. Depending on the argument passed, this method will update the level, score, or handle audio notifications.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - the observable object being observed.
      arg - an argument passed by the Observable to notify the view about updates (e.g., transitions, score updates).
